name: SLENDOW
description: Slendow, a horror game experience, takes inspiration from the infamous legend of Slender Man. As players delve into the vast and dense forest, the goal : collect the 8 pages scattered throughout the terrain. But be warned, for the forest is not your only enemy. The Slendow creature, an entity even more terrifying than the original Slender Man, relentlessly hunts you at every turn. Will you have the courage to outsmart Slendow and survive the terror?
